reviews.comments: Responsible, friendly and nice host

The place is really amazing and My Linh is a great host. After originally having some problems with a former apartment of hers, she immediately send somebody to check and booked me into this new  apartment. I was very happy about the communication and her actions to make me feel calm and welcome. The apartment is really nice and has a great view. It is also very stylish and has a lot of space. I can't complain about the apartment or My Linh.
This is a great apartment, was a perfect and relaxing stay. The host is super respectful, helpful and responsive,  I highly recommend this stay!

Very comfortable room, lots of space. Good shower and always hot water if needed.
Very central location - the room is actually in a residential building which is the same block as a shopping centre so everything is literally on your doorstep.
Lovely side view of the pool (didnâ€™t use this) and onto the sea, lovely.
Huge supermarket right next door in levels 3 and 4 for supplies for the room.

Very clean, serviced daily. Access to shops, restaurants, beach fantastic. Good sized room, bath! with very comfortable bed, fridge and fire escape/balcony R407.
Beach is minutes walking, makes up for the small pool (large spa if it had bubbles)
Really enjoyed our stay and could easily have stayed longer. Thank you.

I like the sky view the most, you can see the entire street, itâ€™s amazing in daytime because I work in the desk near the window.
Good location, many restaurants and cafe nearby, near to the beach too.
Reception staffs are quite friendly.
Reasonable price. Highly recommend!

Cong was responsive, check-in was easy, place was clean, no weird smells. Location was good with the beach only a few blocks away and plenty of food / supermarkets around..
Few cons:
- No hand soap, only a really smelly shampoo
- The pool on the roof is useless, but there's a beach near by anyway
- No iron or steamer
Overall, these cons were quite minor and didn't affect my stay.

Small Roof top pool, eveything clean. Cute and friendly staff. Everything works. Under marketed, over delivered. added the buffet photos after arrival but the buffet is not needed. great food all over the place. location  and accommodation for cost was great. I went for a visa, and had to purchase a visa to enter vietnam to obtain a visa for indonesia so i wasnâ€™t really happy with going to vietnam in the first place and not happy about the system in general but i tried to make the best of it. never met chon. maybe just AI for the staff to use. It was clean and worked. nothing was wrong with the place.

The owner Cong is hands down fantastic!
The place was very unsatisfactory in our opinion.
Toilet positioned such that you have to sit sideways to use it.
Shower drain, slow, front desk notified, 3 days later drain clogged, water pooling over entire bathroom floor. Resolved after it got that bad.
Karaoke bar that runs til 2300 every night.
Window shades in disrepair and almost non-functional, told front desk, informed all were slated for repair. No change while there.
No bathroom products except toilet paper, and a pump bottle of soap with a broken pump, had to pour it in to our hands when showering.
Housekeeping, cleaned the room but never changed the sheets entire stay, 11 nights. [We made note of a stain to ensure this is accurate.]
No hot water for 2 nights with no notice.
Motor bike rental, the bike shwed up almost bone dry for fuel. Gas gauge flashing warning about low fuel.
None of this was anything Cong could have done anything about so we never bothered him.
Fast replies, easy check in and I came in around 3 am. No problems at all and the room was just as pictured!

Large apartment with a sea view,  great to have 2 bathrooms even just for the two of us. So many restaurants, spas, grocery stores & minimarts all on the main floor & the beach across the street! And quiet. Cleaning every 3 days was a plus. Loved the location, would stay here again!

We stayed at this place for ten days and enjoyed it greatly. The appartment itself was worth every penny spent. A lot of space, 2 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms, a wonderfully-equipped kitchen (if you need something extra, you'll be given it nearly immediately) and a balcony with a beautiful view of the sea to the left and the whole city to the right. The location was also perfect. You should have just crossed the road to get to the beach with soft warm sand. There were a lot of places around to eat or buy anything you wanted. And if you decided to get to the center, a taxi (or a scooter) was right at the enterance at any time.
The host is very hospitable and easy to get.
Highly recommended!

Location is great, right next to supermarket, walkable near the apartment. Need to update for comfortable of apartmets, kitchen and kitchen tools. Host is very resbons fast.

The place was modern and very clean, looks exactly like what the photos shows. Would definitely come back if I visit Nha Trang again. I also have already recommended this place to family and friends. We were there with 4 people and the Apartment was still big enough. It was very clean, very near to the beach and around the Apartment were a lot of good foods. We highly recommend the Apartment.

We would like to express our great gratitude to the owner of the apartment! She's amazing! Clean, new, spacious, with a fantastic view of the city, especially at night! The owner answered the questions in 1 minute. He was very responsive and hospitable! We liked it very much!!! Very quiet area. 5 minutes from the noisy center! The complex has a swimming pool with cool water. We lived in many places in Nha Trang! This is the coolest place! We recommend !!! And we will definitely come back only here !!!

Great view and great apartment. All is exactly as in description. Fully-equipped kitchen if you wanna cook, lots of space, washing machine with detergent, big and clean bathroom. Check in was easy, the host - extremely responsive and friendly. Totally recommend!

De appartement was zoals omschreven en erg comfortabel. De host is heel erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Ik had niet veel vragen want oorspronkelijk kom ik uit Nha Trang en woont mijn familie dichtbij waar ik verblijf. Ik neem zeker weer contact op met de host voor mijn volgende verblijf in Nha Trang.

The response is great
You have to pay for parking 10k vnd per day which is cheap and good security the view from the apartment is amazing worth it

Amazing!
On the northern end, away from the tacky tourist district. More likely to get decent (+ cheaper) local food & goods here.
Exactly like photos, spectacular view, 23rd flr, spacious, v clean, v quiet. Building felt safe + respectable, lifts clean and fast to arrive. Communal area clean.
Kitchen skmply furnished e.g. some dishes, bowls, cutlery, and 2 mugs. Kettle + coffee machine, too. Huge, very clean fridge. Dish soap & cleaning cloth provided, but no tea towels. Full size 4-seat dining table.
Great shower, no leaking, turn on hot water 10 minutes before, shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, hand soap, decent thick towels (two per person) and reasonably strong hair dryer. Lots of toilet tissue given.
Washing machine great to freshen up clothes, Air conditioners and the standing fan operated flawlessly.
Hosts polite, extremely responsive and helpful; they have these detailed, clear digital guides on how to check in, how to find the place, etc which were really helpful.
This place looked exactly like the pictures. The bedroom was massive and it was absolute vibes walking up to that view. Very quiet and local street too. Amazing stay!
The apartment was in a convenient location and slightly quieter, just a walk away from the main strip. We enjoyed our stay. Thanks!

So well done and such an oasis.
We had a wonderful stay at this house. This place was amazing. It was clean, comfortable, stylish and pet friendly. The host was very responsive and helpful. Highly recommend.

The place is just as cute and private as the pictures. Walking to the beachfront takes only a couple of minutes. The host was fantastic.
The only downside of my trip was that their was no hot water due to the house using solar power to heat up and the weather has not been sunny at all. I enjoy cold water shower so no problem there but my friends didnâ€™t enjoy that so just watch out for the weather.

Totally worth the money. The host is super responsive and supportive. We asked for some essential kitchen supplies prior to our visit and she prepared everything which was really kind of her. I would like to point out that the bed was super comfy and the bedding was delightfully soft (it was mega important for us because we stayed in the hotel for 20 days and if the bedlinen got coarse and skin irritable due to harsh chemical whitening it would have been very uncomfortable, specially when we came along with our 6-year old kid).
The location of the hotel is in the heart of Nha Trang that offers variety of foods. Beach was only across the street which we were happy about.
Cleanness of the hotel is good. Free of any tropical insects that can be a nasty problem. I would highly recommend the room and thankful for the hostess. Would stay here again.
It's a fantastic room in the heart of Nha Trang with stunning views, so many restaurants and stores nearby. Thanks Nhan for everything!

One of the best hosts and best Air BnBâ€™s weâ€™ve stayed at (and weâ€™ve stayed at a lot!). Thao was always available and responsive and very helpful. The property was big, beautiful and we felt right at home. Grocery store, convenience stores, cafes and restaurants literally steps from the building. And the beach is across the street (and much more clean and relaxing than in the town center). Honestly, we loved the property and location so much that we only went downtown once and spent most of our time exploring this great neighbourhood. I canâ€™t recommend Thaoâ€™s Air BnB enough. Would give 10 stars if I could!
It was such an amazing experience staying here. The host was extremely helpful and east to reach out to. The new place was well maintained and catered to all the needs.Definitely worth every penny.

Thao is a great host and she takes very good care of the apartment.
Everything matches the description. I felt like home. The location is not that far, instead I prefer to stay here than in the centre. Lots of food and local restaurants around. The beach is just across the street.
The apartment has everything I need so this apartment is perfect for someone who wants a quick get away or in a business trip. The apartment is well decorated, neat and clean.
Thao even offered a small gift before I checked out and I really appreciate the gift.
I will definitely book Thao's apartment again if I'm back to NT.
Overall, this apartment is highly recommended.

Fantastic Air BnB. One of the best Air BnB hosts I have ever experienced- Thao was incredibly thorough, thoughtful, helpful and prompt during all correspondence. They helped us with all requests including transport onto our next destination.
The photos are accurate of the listing. It is very clean, comfortable beds, great spaces to chill out in the living room and balcony. It is very easy to feel at home here- basic kitchen to allow you to make breakfast and store food. AC in each room and offers of extra services eg cleaning throughout the stay. Iâ€™m sure if you had any additional requests Thao would be more than willing to assist you in any way.
As stated in the listing it isnâ€™t in a central location. However, this wasnâ€™t an issue as it is seconds away from the beach and a supermarket. It was very easy to make our own way into town by walk (40mins-1hr) or by taxi (10-15min).
I would recommend this listing for anyone staying in Nha Trang! Exceeded all expectations.

the place was amazing and it is located in an amazing area. the view of the beach is a plus and vinh was an amazing host!! i would definitely come here again if i have the chance!

We stayed here for 4 nights and had a great time. Very convenient location and close to the beach. Vinh the host was amazing, very responsive to questions and went out of his way to help with our needs. Definitely recommend this place and would stay again!

Nice, clean and comfortable place for us to stay. The location is just good and we walked around for 5 to 7 minutes and were able to reach the beach. The view from the balcony is just amazing.
Also to mention - the wifi speed was really good for me and my friend to work.
The kitchen was well equipped for us to cook something for the kids.
The location is just right if someone wants to go to the beach or look around for food places and a couple of Pagodas are also near by.
The host - Vinh - is nice and responsive. Thanks.
Scope for improvement - would be nice to have detergent for washing machine. And some pre written instructions about garbage disposal.
Otherwise this place is good and the Host makes you feel welcome and very helpful.
Overall a good stay.
Thanks.

The place itself is OK, however, there were other uncomfortable nuances.. First is - the SMELL. Apparently they painted the walls right before my check in.. and the room was not properly aired. As a result, for the 2 nights that I slept there I had to breathe that horrible chemical smell of some cheap paint...Somehow, I survived. Yet, people with more sensitive lungs or respiratory issues might not be so lucky. Besides the smell, the room wasn't really cleaned well. Tones of hair on the floor.. mixed with dust. My soles were charcoal-black after 10 mins in that room..  The location and the room itself is still fine for the price. Lack of proper management though, is what makes me to rate it -  2/5.

I kinda feel reluctant to leave this review just in case more others rush to this hidden gem in Nha Trang and then booking is getting hard for me.  But itâ€™s a MUST stay if you look for somewhere like a wild judge vibe but also enjoy a comfy stay. This is a two floors apartment and I stayed at ground floor this time. Room is spacious and everything in an Ancient Greek style deco. Thereâ€™s a kitchen and mini pool in the yard for share with other guests on first floor. U can enjoy an outdoor shower and dipping in the pool by those tropical plants which was exactly what Iâ€™ve been doing and taking lots good vibed photos. This place is quiet too but not far from main road and beach. A mini mart is around the corner too. And the host is super nice when I found body wash in short, the host came to my rescue in person within 10 mins. Overall itâ€™s defiantly a paradise and also an important reason I would like to revisit Nha Trang.

The view from our apartment was fantastic. We made most of our meals in the apartment which was Adequate for our needs. We could get some of our basic Groceries right across the street and a winmart just around the corner.
Moon milk market within a 15 minute walk. A huge local market downtown was an experience to go and see even if you didn't buy anything there. Anna always responded to our questions and was very helpful. There were many restaurants within Walking distance of our building all of them that we visited were very good. We would definitely recommend this place for anybody visiting Vietnam.
The place was amazing with all the mentioned amenities. It has clear sea view balcony to enjoy.  everything was so clean and tidy. The host is also very responsive even late night.

It's located bit northern part from the city but the beach near the appartment is great and the view looking outside was never get bored..also I use rooftop swimming pool and it was really nice to chill, not crowded. and they have reception running 24/7, so my checkin was very smooth even I arrived there 2am.
Great apartment, clean and spacious with great views. Beach within 2 minutes walk and plenty to do in the area. Anna was a great host and was very quick and responding. Will definitely stay again
Sehr schÃ¶ne, moderne Wohnung. Alles war sauber. Die Wohnung empfehle ich sehr gerne weiter.
So far so good. Just that balcony has no privacy due to the other unit being able to see us.

We stayed for a week at Anna's apartment and could not have been happier. For us the location, away from the mass tourism spots down by the Lotus building, was a big attraction, The area around the building - the restaurants, bars and locals, seemed far more genuine in this location and we loved the vibe.
The apartment does not disappoint in any way, the view from the balcony constantly changes depending on time of day, daylight and lighting - we never tired of sitting on the balcony, early morning, late afternoon or nightcap time - wonderful. The apartment was spotlessly clean, very well maintained, equipped to a high standard, had a fantastic fridge/freezer and very effective a/c. The bathroom again was very well maintained and has the best walk-in waterfall shower head I have experienced. The bed is huge and extremely comfortable.
We did not hear any sound from neighbouring apartments, it was nice to have a 24hr concierge presence in the lobby.
We will return to Anna's again.

Hi everyone,
I just checked out from my accommodation, and Iâ€™d like to share some thoughts. First of all, I booked the room very late at night, around dawn, but Cong still responded and confirmed my reservation, which I greatly appreciated. Additionally, I was able to check in as early as 4:40 AM thanks to the 24-hour reception.
Later, I realized that unfortunately, the pool on the 15th floor wasnâ€™t operational. I mentioned that it was quite important to me, and they very kindly upgraded me to an even better room with an ocean view. Cong and the reception staff were extremely helpful, kind, and spoke English, which isnâ€™t always common in Vietnam.
Since I needed a late checkout, they allowed me to stay longer without any extra charges, which was another notable and kind gesture.

Wi-Fi speed is more than enough for everyday usage: stable 50Mb/s upload and download (according to Speed App, but my Steam download peaked at 460 Mb/s and 110GB of content downloaded in 30 minutes!)

Perfect location and highest comfort. Feels more like homely stay than generic hotel service. Thank you! <3

Staying at this accommodation was a true delight. It was furnished with all of the necessary amenities that one might need, decorated in a clean and stylish fashion and boasted a bed that was especially comfortable. Not to mention access to a washing machine on the balcony that overlooks the ocean! The location itself is convenient to many groceries, restaurants, pharmacies, etc and is only 5-10 minutes away by motorbike to the main centre of the city. Because of this, there still maintains a sense of peacefulness to the general locality. The hosts were gracious, extremely communicative and were helpful in any way that they could be. They do offer an airport taxi service to and from the apartment for you to avail should you wish. This apartment would be a lovely stay for any guest in Nha Trang for their holiday retreat!

Very much enjoyed my month long stay at Tram Anhâ€™s place in Nha Trang. Communications were friendly and always helpful. I had an issue with the electronic keypad for the door during my stay(dead battery), and it was fixed promptly.
The location is in a high-rise condo building north of the city center with many Russians. It can get a bit crazy with the amount of tourists there, so be prepared. As I had a motorbike, it was easy to get around. If you are without transportation, Grab will be your best friend. Decent beach right at your doorstep as well.
The unit was simple and comfortable. A great cooking environment that complimented the living space. Balcony with a view of the water. Quality washing machine. Comfy bed in the bedroom. The window to the hallway leaked light until 4am, so be aware of that.
The major downside was the bathroom. Small, no ventilation, and always a slight smell from the floor drain. Hot water was hit or miss.
All in all, I really enjoyed my time here.
Die Wohnung ist super schÃ¶n eingerichtet und sehr gemÃ¼tlich. Eine echte Erfahrung einmal im 27. Stock zu wohnen. Klare Empfehlung!

The apartment is in the middle of the area very close to the beach and close to everything you need such as restaurants, cafes, convenient stores and pharmacies. I liked everything they prepared in the apartment because it was very welcoming, felt like home and complete with everything. Tram Anh provides all information very quickly and she tries to help you as quickly as possible.  I will come back on my next trip

We are extremely pleased with this place! Such a beautiful apartment and an amazing view from the window. Mattress and linens, oh my god, that mattress! He is so soft that I was very sorry to leave. The apartments are very clean and comfortable, there is everything for both short and long stays. There were even balloons in the bedroom! Communication with the owner was warm and comfortable. I recommend this accommodation

lovely place

Location: Only recommended if you have a scooter. It is 1hr 15 mins walk from city centre. 15-20 mins public bus, but buses come every 30 mins and stop running after 7pm. Grab bike to city centre about 35,000 vnd/way. Tours charge extra for this location.
Facilities: You can dry clothes on the rooftop. Hot water in my room 201 was by luck. Before 8pm, I could get hot water. But afterwards, only cold water.
Room cleanness: One room cleaning/week for free. In my experience, I only asked for once and never ever again. Why? Hygiene problems! The cleaner used the brush to clean the toilet bowl first, then the plate. And no proper cleaning for the mop.
Comfort: Their billboard flashes and disturbs sleep at night even with the curtain closed.
Noise: There was always "noise" from local couples during weekends. And the dogs keep barking from early morning til midday.
The manager Ashley was very nice and helpful and the only person who can speak English here. The owners are bad though

My Linh's place was clean and pretty much what I expected from the description. Convenient location. Walkable to all major sites. Located in a quieter local area than the beach side streets.

We stayed at this place for a month and it was really great for our needs. Lightening fast internet!  We wanted a nice place to call home for a month as we weren't planning on a lot of activity.  We loved the homey feeling and decorations....it struck just the right feeling and tone for us.  We also appreciated how clean it was.  The view is wonderful!  Overall, we felt like we picked one of the best options in Nha Trang for our stay.  The location was good....we kind of wished we were closer to the part of town that had a multitude of amazing restaurants to choose from but having said that, there were plenty of good eating options around where we were. We often took a Grab or walked (about 25 minutes) to some of the restaurants we found on google maps. The kitchen was missing a few small items (e.g., coffee maker, wine cork, a good towel for drying after washing) but we found those items easily at the Lotte supermarket so this wasn't really a problem.

I loved my stay here! The apartment was spacious, clean, and had a stunning view. The reception staff were kind and helpful, and the host was also very responsive and supportive throughout my stay. I would happily stay here again and highly recommend it! ğŸ˜

I definitely would recommend this place for longer stays guests in Nha Trang.  Check in was easy and walkable to the beach and Cho Dam market.  The apartment was spacious and comfortable for 4 persons.  There is a pool on the rooftop which is accessible before 7pm.  You can find some good food around the area too.  If you want to prepare your own restrictive meal due to your diet you can find a morning market and supermarket nearby.

This was awesome. It's QUIET, 20th floor. None of that street level mega noise.
It has hotel-grade mattresses - very very comfortable.
We were able to function here for 2 weeks as a family - cooking for our baby, doing laundry - the apartment is sufficiently equipped.
I thought the view was among most iconic you can get - you see Dam market, green hills and mountains, river and see at the same time. Beautiful.
Rooftop pool was mostly empty, so that was great. Kids playroom (if that's your case) was huge benefit.
Everything felt new and it was very clean. No humidity and no bad-smelling wardrobes like in other places.
We loved our stay at Binhâ€™s. We felt so comfortable coming back here after a long day of exploring. Amenities were fantastic and location was central. Thank you for a great stay!

Our stay was amazing. Apartment is clean, spacious and, most importantly, with breathtaking view. Check in was easy, host was super responsive and always ready to help. Location is great with lots of restraints and shops nearby and the sea in ~7 mins walk. Gym is small, but nice. Area with the pool is nice, but keep in mind it is not heated so in winter it is cold.
Highly recommend â€œSinh Tá»‘ Bi fresh juiceâ€ for fresh juices and smoothies (especially strawberry + banana smoothie)
The only minus is that WiFi is ok for basic tasks, but if you have zoom calls it is too weak and you better buy SIM card with internet.

The apartment is in a great location with views of the city and a smaller view of the ocean on a nice outdoor (20thfloor) patio.  Binh and Kelly were great and when we needed a few extra kitchen items they had them delivered to us.  The rooftop pool is a big plus also.
Nice and spacious Airbnb. Great location very close to the beach. Rooftop pool and gym closes at 7pm which is unfortunately early. Decent buffet breakfast downstairs at the hotel side.

This beautiful house has very friendly and helpful owners, they will do everything to make you comfortable. From the first days I felt at home. Fast Internet, no problems with hot water, everything you need for cooking is available. Near the house there is a market, a supermarket, a cafe, 5 minutes walk to the embankment, 10 minutes to the mountain climb, it's a good place. I lived in this house for 2 months, I thank the hosts for their hospitality, if I am in Nha Trang, I will undoubtedly choose this house again for long-term rent â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
the room corresponds to the description, price and photo. the owners of the house are always in touch and ready to help. there is a grocery market and a supermarket near the location.

Perfect place when ypu want to be a bit more far away from the center :)
more local

I lived in Vicky's house for 1 month, and it was one of the most pleasant experiences in my entire trip to Asia. First of all, thanks to the hosts. Thi Bich Tram and Nam are very responsive hosts, they were always in touch with me, helped when needed. Such hosts are worth their weight in gold! I felt at home.
I lived in several rooms in the house. The room with a window in the wall is a bit dark, it did not suit me because I spend a lot of time at home because of work. But the room is neat, new and clean.
There is a small market right around the corner, also a store, cafe, embankment nearby, a great beach is a 15-minute walk away, and the climb to Angel Mountain is a 10-minute walk away. The area will suit you if you like peace and quiet, immersion in the life of locals (there are very few tourists), unity with nature. I already miss the house and Nha Trang very much, thank you for this experience!

Clean, luxury place at an affordable rate. Just like the description. Big big bed probably 4 can sleep on it. The wifi works great. The AC did take long to turn on and cool the room, but we just left it on :). The TV did not have any channels or netflix so many this can be added with firestick or similar. Stay there for 7 days the view every morning was beautiful. I would stay here again if I come to nha trang

Nhans place was a perfect getaway location. The apartment was spacious and clean.Internet was good, AC took a while to start up but was great once on.
The view was beautiful to see the sunrise in the morning.
Hot water for shower was great as was the shower pressure. There were enough amenities, like toothbrush, combs and hair dryer.
Location was central to almost everything and just across the road to the beach with private cabanas available to visitors.
Only downside was that the pool was closed due to renovations, which we were not told of sooner, because we do like to have access to the pool and it was also a selling point at this property.
Also, there was a sensor light by the fridge and it would turn on every time there was movement which actually very annoying.
You have to pay for extra towels during your stay but we did not stay long enough so it worked out well for us.
Would definitely come back and recommend to others. FIX that light please!

My girlfriend and I had a pleasant stay in Nhanâ€™s Condo in Nha Trang. The room was exactly as described, clean and modern, and in an excellent location right across from the beach. Guests have access to all facilities within StarCity hotel including the private beach facilities and pool.
I would recommend staying at Nhanâ€™s place and wouldnâ€™t hesitate to return :)
Thank you Nhan :)

Booked and stay there for 2 nights. Fast response from host, and she even helped me to inform taxi service about my flight delay. Strategic location, near to happening area (about 5- 10 minutes walk) Quiet and relaxing place. And the mud bath is awesome in Nha Trang! you can have seaview while relaxing in the room.

WOW!! The room was incredible really large open with a view over the bay in Nha Trang. We have lived in Nha Trang and been many times and this condotel is incredible value for money. It's new the rooms are large and open balcony and the view over the bay is great. Can't recommend it highly enough and it's obvious why the place is so busy and nearly always booked out.

Great location & value for money. The apartment was clean and well equipped. Bed was large and very comfortable. Nhan was always quick to respond to questions, as well as sorting out a pickup and drop off from/to airport that was cheaper than Grab!

Quyen's place was  just as described and pictured.  Fantastic view of the beach and city from the balcony. I was pleasantly surprised by how close this apartment is to the beach. It's only about 5 minutes away (maybe less). The view from the balcony was great, and the apartment was clean and spacious. Each room is cozy and private, so everyone has their own space to unwind. And the amenities? Top-notch. From a fully equipped kitchen to fast Wi-Fi and plenty of entertainment options, everything was there to make the stay comfortable and hassle-free.

Celine was very responsive and helpful with all the requests and adjustments and i really want to thank Celine for this during our stay in Nha Trang.
Beautiful place and layout, only vice was availability of AC in the common areas. and the concerning power of the ACs in the rooms, which would have added more to the comfort.
overall, a highly recommended place and though there is not to do in the area the house is in, but it is very close to the main city centre without any inconvenience.
